org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.as.codegen

Class InlineFunctionLexicalScope

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.as.codegen.LexicalScope
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.as.codegen.InlineFunctionLexicalScope

  • public class InlineFunctionLexicalScope
extends LexicalScope
    Lexical scope which is constructed when inlining a function. This allows us to modify the lexical scope of the calling function, and if the inline fails unwind any changes which were made to the scope.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.as.codegen.LexicalScope
